ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: O man! what has deluded you in respect of your Noble Lord?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O man, what seduced you from your munificent Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O man! What has deceived you about your generous Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Human being, what evil has deceived you about your Gracious Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O man! What has deceived you away from your Lord, the Most Beneficent?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O man! What has made you careless about your Lord, the Most Generous
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O man! what has beguiled you from your Lord, the Gracious one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Man! What deceived thee as to thy generous Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O man! What hath made thee careless concerning thy Lord, the Bountiful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O man! What is it that lures you away from your bountiful Sustainer,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O man! what hath beguiled thee concerning thy Lord, the Bountiful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O man! What has deceived you about your generous Lord,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O man! What has seduced thee from thy Lord Most Beneficent?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O man! What has made you careless concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O human! What has deceived you concerning your Generous Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O man! What deluded you concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:6] O, disbelieving, man! What has deceived you with regard to your generous Lord?, so that you have disobeyed Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 man!) i.e. disbelieving man; here referring specifically to Kildah Ibn Usayd (What hath made thee careless concerning thy Lord) when you disbelieved in Him, (the Bountiful) the Forgiving,
